amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the environmental quality incentives program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section at the end of the bill which states that the limitation in section 721 shall not apply below a program level of $1,127,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bonilla amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Bonilla.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bonilla amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
